desc: Dainty is a benchmark beating Sanitary Napkin with an ultra-dry cotton top sheet, super absorbent core and a breathable back sheet. Our proprietary pads are free from parabens, chlorine or fragrances. We are so confident you'll love Dainty we'll even refund your money if you're unhappy (...but you won't be!)

layout.text: A NEW ERA. ONE PERIOD AT A TIME.
